entry.data:
SUNNY, COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
RAIN SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
